title: Cipher Mining Prices $1.1B Upsized Convertible Note Offering
source: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

body.raw: Proceeds are intended to support Barber Lake buildout, HPC expansion, and capped call transactions to reduce share dilution.
